name: There's So Many Of Them!
description:
Ascii game where you shoot red guys until you die. Game I made in a day back in 2015. Uploading to bulk up my portfolio, and also to prove to myself how far I've come.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move
  • Z to shoot 
  • X to shoot shotgun style
  • C to shoot a giant laser

No I don't know what the red guys are. Maybe they're zombies, maybe they're communists. 

Link to source code: https://github.com/kaijyuu2/tsmot_source

Uses my own homemade game engine to power it (also available on my github; can just be copy/pasted into the same folder as tsmot's source to "install" it).
